data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Pirotski, Serbia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pirotski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Pirotski, Serbia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 348 believers find a person of peace today among the 48,152 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Pirotski words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Adyghe people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Pirotski prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Pirotski, Serbia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, you gave the church of Pirotski, Serbia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
